textValues.string: Businesses are being tasked with delivering a positive customer experience for an ever larger, ever more diverse, global customer base, across additional service channels. Customer self service initially meant publishing a web page. The advent of email, chat and forums has not diminished the need for the web site or knowledge base but has served to complement all of the new channels that have since emerged. For global companies, this experience of communication needs to be consistent across languages and provide a balance between meeting their own brand expectations for communication across a specific channel with the customer’s expectation for immediacy.
